paragraph.paragraph: EiffelEnvision is a complete language plug-in, also known as a package, for Visual Studio .NET 2003. It facilitates developers with the ease in which existing languages, such as Visual C# and Visual Basic .NET provide, to create and manage projects, but with the power of Eiffel and eiffel_for_dotnet/index.xmlEiffel for .NET. EiffelEnvision integrates the Eiffel language into Visual Studio .NET seamlessly, exploiting the rich tool set found in Visual Studio .NET.

Because EiffelEnvision integrates with the Visual Studio .NET IDE, Eiffel for .NET programmers can use Visual Studio .NET designers to create XML Web services and Windows Forms applications. In addition, Eiffel Software's library suit is also available allowing developers to create windows application using the EiffelVision 2 multi-platform library.
Many new features, additions and enhancements have been made in this release of EiffelEnvision making it an incompatible rival to previous releases.
